More About Me

About Ryan

Looks like you wanted to know more about me. Well, you came to the right place :). So let me talk about myself from the very beginning of my existence. I was born in a bustling city of Bundang, South Korea, where I spent most of my childhood in. Shortly after I turned ten years old, my family and I relocated to the Irvine, California, where I learned how to speak and write in English. After moving to Massachusetts for highschool, where I decied to pursue my career in computer science. Looking back at my time in highschool, I realize that I wasn't too sure what I really wanted to do . I have always been interested in physics and programming, but I didn't have enough knowledge in either of the fields to know exactly what I wanted to do. So I made a last minute decision to pursue computer science. I know that I would always have had a chance to pivot during college, but the fact that my whole career path came from a last minute decision is something I still find amusing. But don't get me wrong, I am glad that the decision turned out great for me. Soon after getting my highschool diploma, I was ready for my first year of college at RPI.
